# [Interview #727: Hero of Ages Q&A - TWG, Entry #80](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=727#80)

#### [firstRainbowRose (18 October 2008)](http://twg.17thshard.com/index.php?topic=6655.msg129300#msg129300)

Is Sazed effected by the metal blindness, or can he see thing written in metal?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (20 October 2008)](http://twg.17thshard.com/index.php?topic=6655.msg129389#msg129389)

He is blinded by metal.
